Cardiovascular Diseases/Heart Diseases/Myocardial Ischemia/Acute Coronary Syndrome
Cardiovascular Diseases/Vascular Diseases/Myocardial Ischemia/Acute Coronary Syndrome
Record.Description: An episode of MYOCARDIAL ISCHEMIA that generally lasts longer than a transient anginal episode but that does not usually result in MYOCARDIAL INFARCTION.
